page.title: 19Leisure Activities
page.content: Aspatria has one bingo hall which used to be a cinema six pubs and two lscenced clubs(rugby league & union). The Memorial Park provides a play area for children with swings and slides,soccer pitches, bowling greens, tennis courts and a bmx track. The secondary school has a gym and a running track which are used by the communityasis the open-air swimming pool. There is an Athletic Club which fosters sports for children and adults. There are well supported Brownie and Cub Packs and a Girl Guide group. There is a detachment of the Cumbria Army Cadet Force in Outgang Road. This is the Army's youth organisation and catres for boys(and girls in one detachment as a trial scheme) from the age of 13 to 18 years 9 months. The cadets learn fieldcraft,skill at arms
